summary: PHP SDK lacks a way to dynamically set workflow details from within the workflow itself, a capability that other Temporal SDKs support.
userImpact: Users cannot dynamically update workflow details from within their workflow code, limiting visibility and context management capabilities.
proposedFix: Implement a SetCurrentDetails method or equivalent API for PHP workflows to allow dynamic detail setting at runtime.
keyQuote: Want to set current details from the workflow itself. Apparently Temporal can do that, but PHP does not yet have a way to set it.
